item.title: Part 6
item.description: Minutes after arriving in Jamaica you could be bowling along the empty coast road , bound for Portland where Sinopia Inn resides...

item.title: Part 5
item.description: Rum we have a lot of that , Reggae music we have a lot of that too and Rastas are never to far or hard to find . Just some of the things our guest love about Portland but there so much more...

item.title: Part 4
item.description: When you enter Portland you are entering the parish known to many Jamaicans as the birth place of Jamaica’s tourism. Who feel that Port Antonio's relative underdevelopment compared to the island's other resort towns, gives it a special charm...

item.title: Part 3
item.description: Jamaica is well served by three modern international airports, and the island enjoys direct connectivity to most major US gateways. Jamaica averages 37 flights daily from the US, ranging from a low of 30 on Tuesdays to a high of 48 on Saturdays...

item.title: Part 2
item.description: From the contemporary interior decor and units that compliments the parishes natural rustic charm to the higher level of personal service and recognition provided by the proprietors and staff...

item.title: Part 1
item.description: Finding Sinopia Inn is easy. However if you drive to fast along Portland's main road you’ll miss the turn into Zion Hill. Here you’ll find a newly renovated country home...
